name: xrnrel

stmt.origin: mpbir(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cxrn(c0, c1))
-| wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cxrn(c0, c1))
-| wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

stmt.origin: sstri(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
-| wss(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(universe, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cxrn(c0, c1))
-| wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
-| wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
-| wss(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(universe, universe))

|- wrel(cxrn(c0, c1))
-| wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
-| wss(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(universe, universe))

|- wrel(cxrn(c0, c1))
-| wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

body.origin: |- wb(wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)), wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

comment: A range Cartesian product is a relation. This is Scott Fenton's ~ txprel with a different symbol, see ~ https://github.com/metamath/set.mm/issues/2469 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
